Text.Page: I need to return to Chatran, but I'd never survive the journey. Too many blasted argons!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"You will, under my protection."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Excellent! I'm eager to return to work. Let me know when you're ready to set out.
You're as good as your word, <PCNAME>. Thank you.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"You're welcome."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
By the way, I found a letter. Judging from all the big words, it's from a baraka. Think you could find the owner? I'd start looking at {@Rgn:78001}.
